data.title: How has the film industry impacted our perceptions of culture and society?
data.meta_description: Answer: Film industries have an important role in moulding our perspective related to something, whether its about certain people, ethnicities, societies, countries or even religions. We all grow up watching movies. And movies have passively moulded how we see people or different societies. I'll ...
